scripts.cy:run: pnpm i && concurrently --prefix-colors blue,yellow --names server,cypress 'pnpm exec tui start' 'wait-on --timeout 60000 http-get://127.0.0.1:3000/ping && pnpm exec cypress run --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:3000 --quiet' --kill-others --success command-cypress
scripts.dev: concurrently --prefix-colors blue,yellow --names 'server,cypress' 'pnpm --filter library dev' 'pnpm cypress open --e2e --browser=electron > /dev/null 2>&1' --kill-others
